do they just skipped the 2026 firmwares?

image580×890 75.8 KB

*Captured in Phoenix Tuner X with Simulated code

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2025-07-09T12:50:49.267Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":28,"reads":395,"readers_count":394,"score":239.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":504068,"topic_slug":"did-i-just-miss-something","display_username":"Austin Yu","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":68789,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2024"},"post_url":"/t/did-i-just-miss-something/504068/1","custom_user_title":"2024","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3677163,"name":"Brian Wagg","username":"cad321","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/c57346/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-07-09T12:57:32.391Z","cooked":"

This is likely to support teams alpha testing the new SystemCore controller, scheduled to roll out to all teams in 2027.

The 2026 firmware will likely come out much closer to kickoff this year as CTRE develops new features for this coming season.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2025-07-09T12:57:47.483Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":365,"readers_count":364,"score":193.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":504068,"topic_slug":"did-i-just-miss-something","display_username":"Brian Wagg","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/frc-blog-systemcore-alpha-testing-first-wave/503108","internal":true,"reflection":false,"title":"[FRC BLOG] SystemCore Alpha Testing - First Wave","clicks":5}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":6}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":19532,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Brian Wagg"},"post_url":"/t/did-i-just-miss-something/504068/2","custom_user_title":"Brian Wagg","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":6}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":6,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3677164,"name":"Scott W","username":"Programming4907","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/programming4907/{size}/168313_2.png","created_at":"2025-07-09T12:57:45.180Z","cooked":"

I believe this is to be compatible with the new control system, which is currently being tested by some beta tester teams, but isn’t due for general release until 2027.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2025-07-09T12:57:45.180Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":336,"readers_count":335,"score":112.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":504068,"topic_slug":"did-i-just-miss-something","display_username":"Scott W","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50699,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/did-i-just-miss-something/504068/3","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3677167,"name":"Dalton","username":"daltzsmith","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/daltzsmith/{size}/206287_2.png","created_at":"2025-07-09T13:17:28.422Z","cooked":"

This firmware is indeed to support the 2027 SystemCore alpha, intended for usage with SystemCore.

This firmware is not compatible with the 2025 of API or WPILib. 2025 or previous channel firmware is not compatible with the 2027 SystemCore alpha.

I apologize for the confusion here.

do they just skipped the 2026 firmwares

Nah, you slept for an entire year.

I was trying to explain Rip Van Winkle to a middle schooler at camp last week. In their defense, they didn’t have the benefit of watching Wishbone re-enact these stories each day after school.

ngreen:

they didn’t have the benefit of watching Wishbone re-enact these stories each day after school.

They didn’t… They might though if Mattel has their way

In 2020, Deadline reported that Mattel and Universal Pictures are rebooting “Wishbone.”

As part of 19 other movies like a Rockem Sockem Robots movie. I’m most excited for that one obviously, but I’d go see a Wishbone movie absolutely.
